plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💚 I am the color of many trees.
🐄 Animals eat me in the field.
🌱 I am short and cover the ground.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and a pretty face. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I often have a nice smell.
💧 I need water to grow.
🌞 I need sunshine to live.

plant.question: I am tall and have a thick trunk. Birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I provide shade on a sunny day.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍂 My leaves fall off in the autumn.

plant.question: I grow underground and can be orange, white, or purple. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🥣 You can make soup with me.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me.

plant.question: I am long and green. I grow on a vine and you can slice me up for a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am mostly water.
🥗 I am a crunchy vegetable.
🥪 You can pickle me.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a fluffy treat when heated. You eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I start as a yellow kernel.
🍿 I taste good with butter and salt.
🎬 You hear me crunching in the dark.

plant.question: I have needles instead of leaves, and I stay green all year. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I am often decorated for Christmas.
🐻 Some animals live in my forest.
🎁 You put presents under me in December.

plant.question: I am a plant that climbs. I have flowers that are purple, white, or pink. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I can grow on fences or walls.
🦋 I attract butterflies.
🏡 I can make a garden look pretty.

plant.question: I am a plant that is very tall and lives for a very long time. Some say I am wise. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 Animals can make their home inside of me.
☀️ I have a strong trunk.
👵 I've been around a long time.

plant.question: I have no leaves, and I live in the desert. I am covered in sharp spines. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I store water inside me.
🏜️ I thrive in hot, dry places.
🌵 My needles protect me.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I make honey.
🌷 I love to visit colorful gardens.
🍯 People love what I make

bug.question: I am small and red with black spots. I am considered good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I have wings, but I'm not a bird.
🔴 I am often found in gardens.
☘️ Some people think I bring good fortune.

bug.question: I march in long lines and carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I work with my friends.
💪 We are known for our strength.
🏡 We live in a colony underground.

bug.question: I used to be a caterpillar. Now I have colorful wings and fly around. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am a symbol of transformation.
🎨 I have beautiful patterns on my wings.
🌸 I drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I hop around and make a chirping sound. I'm usually green and live in grassy fields. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I have long legs for jumping.
🌿 I eat plants.
🎶 You can hear me in the summer.

bug.question: I glow in the dark and light up the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I have a light inside me.
🌃 You can see me best when it's dark.
💡 I'm also called a lightning bug.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I'm not an insect.
🕷️ I am an arachnid.
🏡 I create sticky traps.

bug.question: I make a loud noise by rubbing my wings together. I disappear underground for years. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 My song can be very loud.
🌳 I live in trees.
⏳ I spend most of my life as a nymph.

bug.question: I am long and thin with many legs. I can be found in dark, damp places. What am I?

hints.text: 💯 I have more than 20 legs.
🪵 I like to hide under rocks and logs.
🏃 I am known for my speed.

bug.question: I build a home out of chewed wood and live in colonies. I can cause damage to houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I eat wood
🏘️ I live in a social structure.
🐜 I'm a close relative of the ant.
